participant_1.background:
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
i like tailgate parties.
i have a very tone body.
I am not a big sports fan, I prefer to spend my time with my dog and my job.
I go for a walk in the snow to clear my head.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy strawberries because they are a sweet and juicy treat.
tomorrow is my first day of safety patrol.
i really like technology.
I pray to God for my family every morning and I eat well, but I have never been married.
I'm thinking about getting a new crib for my baby.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well as well. Thank you for asking! What is your favorite fruit?
My favorite fruit is strawberries! They are so sweet and juicy!
I like strawberries too! They are my favorite fruit as well!
That is great! We have something in common!
Yes we do! What is your favorite thing to do in the snow?
I like to go for walks in the snow. It is so peaceful and quiet.
I like going for walks in the snow too! It is so calming.
Yes it is! Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog named Max. He is a golden retriever.
I love golden retrievers! They are so friendly!
They are! He is the best dog I have ever had.
I am sure he is! I have never been married, but I have a baby boy.
Oh, that is great! I am sure you are a great mother.
Thank you! I try my best! I am thinking about getting a new crib for him.
That is a great idea! I am sure he will love it.
I hope so! Thank you for the conversation!
You are welcome! Have a great day!
You too
